function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High-risk patients identification","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 hotspot mapping","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate real-time case surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited information on how covid-19 spreads in asymptomatic individuals","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variation in reliable information on covid-19 transmission between countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of covid-19 testing kits and detection tools","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Quarantine-induced reduction in physical activity energy expenditure","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Impact of stay-at-home on physical and mental health","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Demographic breakdown of study participants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health impacts of lack of access to exercise and physical activity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Over-reporting bias of physical activity in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worsening of psychophysical conditions due to pandemic-induced restrictions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of physical activity levels linked to worse psychological well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender disparity in the correlation between physical activity reduction and psychological well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased physical activity energy expenditure during quarantine","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender differences in exercise habits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low physical activity levels among italian adults, especially during covid-19 quarantine","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in performing intense exercise at home compared to moderate activity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges of maintaining physical activity levels during quarantine","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Worldwide spread of sars-cov-2 leading to containment measures and quarantine","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited sample size for the study","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of national health monitoring and surveillance system for physical activity in italy","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of physical activity linked with worse psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gender differences in the correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Age differences in the association between physical activity and psychological well-being during covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in physical activity levels during covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased housework activities leading to unexpected physical activity levels in certain population groups.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant decrease in physical activity among different gender and age groups during quarantine.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in physical activity behavior compared to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Percentage increase in low active individuals during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participants of the study classified into different groups of physical activity may have different levels of exposure to contagious diseases based on their activity levels.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Subjective perception of well-being during covid-19 emergency may reflect the psychological impact of the pandemic on the participants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of statistical analysis software may introduce errors in data interpretation and reporting.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of covid-19 through the completion of an online questionnaire.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate data due to invalid questionnaire responses or unwillingness of participants to provide valid information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy and data security for participants due to online questionnaire administration.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of online survey may lead to low response rate due to survey fatigue and lack of interest.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential breach of anonymity and confidentiality due to technology or human error.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation or false data through unverified social media channels and personal contacts.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Physical activity may ameliorate pathological outcomes of upper respiratory tract infections urti , including covid-19, by reducing excessive local inflammation and inducing the secretion of anti-inflammatory cytokines.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical activity can be effective in ameliorating mental well-being and preventing symptoms of mental health disorders such as depression and anxiety.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Examination of changes in physical activity levels during self-quarantine may provide insight into the impact of restrictions on physical activity and its correlation with individual well-being.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Undesirable effects of prolonged quarantine","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term detraining due to forced stop of physical activity","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 epidemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 through droplet and close contact","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contamination through bodily fluids and transmission through oral or conjunctival routes","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
